dcterms:description: A real-world inner city dataset captured with vehicle mounted cameras, containing realistic scenarios with data collected by a moving vehicle. The dataset includes Ground Truth labels for pedestriansâ€™ positions, head orientation, and occlusion information, with sequences manually annotated to indicate pedestrian intent to cross the ego-vehicle lane.
dcterms:title: Real-world inner city dataset captured with vehicle mounted cameras
